tier.item: (22) *go-go hoksaang dou jau- mou4 gaau hokfai aa3? (all)
The mou ("not-have") in jau -mou ("have -not-have") is an incorporation of negation and the
morpheme jau ("have"). It is equivalent to the Mandarin counterpart you -mei-you and is thus an A-not-
A structure.
304 Ann Law
CL-CL student all have -not-have pay school fees SFP
"Did all students pay the school fees?"
(22) *go-go hoksaang dou jau- mou4 gaau hokfai aa3? (all)
The mou ("not-have") in jau -mou ("have -not-have") is an incorporation of negation and the
morpheme jau ("have"). It is equivalent to the Mandarin counterpart you -mei-you and is thus an A-not-
A structure.
304 Ann Law
CL-CL student all have -not-have pay school fees SFP
"Did all students pay the school fees?"
go-go hoksaang dou jau-mou4 gaau hokfai aa3?
(all)
The mou ("not-have") in jau -mou ("have -not-have") is an incorporation of negation and the
morpheme jau ("have"). It is equivalent to the Mandarin counterpart you -mei-you and is thus an A-not-
A structure.
304 Ann Law
CL-CL student all have-not-have pay school fees SFP
Did all students pay the school fees?
